sourcesContent:
import './Components.css'; import LogoutBtn from './LogoutBtn'; import SettingBtn from './SettingBtn'; import FavoriesBtn from './FavoritesBtn'; import ShoppingBtn from './ShoppingBtn' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import SearchBar from './SearchBar'; const Navbar = ({ name }) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const recipes = (event) => { event.preventDefault() navigate('/search_recipe') } const trending = (event) => { event.preventDefault() navigate('/trending') } const groceries = (event) => { event.preventDefault() navigate('/groceries') } return (
Recipes
Trending
Groceries at Home
{name}
) } export default Navbar
